Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations. This exceptional item has been meticulously designed and crafted to provide unparalleled performance and convenience. Given its unique features and high-quality materials, we believe it would be an invaluable addition to your collection or operations. We kindly propose a price of $20000 for this remarkable product. Please let us know if you have any questions or require further information. We look forward to the opportunity to serve you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $20,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $20,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
